results.name: Coordination sequence of Dual(4.6.12) tiling with respect to a tetravalent node.
link: N. J. A. Sloane, Illustration of initial terms (shows one 90-degree quadrant of tiling)
N. J. A. Sloane, Overview of coordination sequences of Laves tilings [Fig. 2.7.1 of Grünbaum-Shephard 1987 with A-numbers added and in some cases the name in the RCSR database]
formula: Conjecture: For n>0, a(n)=10n if n even, otherwise 8n.
xref: Cf. A072154, A298041 (partial sums), A298036 (12-valent node), A298038 (hexavalent node).
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 22 2018
ext: Terms a(8)-a(54) added by _Tom Karzes_, Apr 01 2020
